title: Wikipedia
description: Wikipedia is the world's largest encyclopedia, created, moderated, and edited by users for users.  It includes more than 4 Million illustrations and photographs.
extra_description:
About 6 Million articles can be searched using any word(s) that appear in article titles (this is fast!)

Or, do a deep search using any keyword(s) that appear further down in the articles themselves (have patience, this takes time!)
